U

updateUserPassword(User, String) - Method in class htds.DBConnector
Sequence Diagram 8: Update User
Changes the password of the given user.
Only the administrator has the power to change the passwords of the users
the users do not have the power to change their own passwords.
uploadAlert(Alert[]) - Method in class htds.Analyzer
This method uploads an Array of alerts to the database
uploadAlert(Alert[]) - Method in class htds.DBConnector
To add the alerts to the database

url - Variable in class htds.DBConnector
 
User - Class in htds
The User class is a basic data structure that stores basic information about an HTDS user.
User(int, String, String, String, UserProfile) - Constructor for class htds.User
This constructor creates an object of type User with properties equal to the passed arguments
User(int, String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class htds.User
This constructor creates an object of type User with properties equal to the passed arguments
User(User) - Constructor for class htds.User
This constructor creates an object of type User with same properties as the passed User object
userID - Variable in class htds.AlertLog
unique id assigned to each AlertLog
userID - Variable in class htds.AlertProfileLog
a unique non-negative integer identifying each AlertProfileLog object
userID - Variable in class htds.DataLog
a unique integer that identifies each DataLog object
username - Variable in class htds.User
full name of the user
UserProfile - Class in htds
The UserProfile class is a data structure in the User class that defines the access permissions of the User to the HTDS modules Every User has a UserProfile instance as a data member The permissions are defined as a boolean array referring to the following modules: [Viewer, Uploader, Analyzer, ConfigMgr] Once a user profile is created, only the user profile name and permission matrix could be updated
UserProfile() - Constructor for class htds.UserProfile
This constructor creates a UserProfile with all properties set to null
UserProfile(int) - Constructor for class htds.UserProfile
This Constructor creates a userProfile with the given id, but the profileName and permissions are set to null
UserProfile(int, String, boolean[]) - Constructor for class htds.UserProfile
This constructor creates an object of type UserProfile with all properties set according to the passed arguments
UserProfile(UserProfile) - Constructor for class htds.UserProfile
This constructor creates an object of type UserProfile with same properties as the passed UserProfile object
userProfileID - Variable in class htds.User
password to be used during login
